roleset.name: support openly
roleset.note: SPONSOR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'sponsor' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 29.8. (from sponsor.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: active
example.text: So says the Commonwealth Fund, a New York philanthropist that's sponsoring a $1 million project to develop joint masters in business and nursing programs at 10 universities ... .
example.arg: a $1 million project to develop joint masters in business and nursing programs at 10 universities

example.name: passive
example.text: In the 1920s, a young schoolteacher, John T. Scopes, volunteered to be a guinea pig in [a test case]-1 sponsored *trace*-1 by the American Civil Liberties Union to challenge a ban on the teaching of evolution imposed by the Tennessee Legislature.
example.arg: by the American Civil Liberties Union
